data.lyric:
[ti:Stay Stay Stay (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Stay Stay Stay (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:06.57]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:13.15]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:19.73]I'm pretty sure we almost broke up last night
[00:24.47]I threw my phone across the room at you
[00:28.43]
[00:29.19]I was expecting some dramatic turn away
[00:33.41]But you stayed
[00:38.07]
[00:38.89]This morning I said we should talk about it
[00:43.32]'Cause I read you should never leave a fight unresolved
[00:47.56]
[00:48.13]That's when you came in wearing a football helmet
[00:52.46]And said "Okay let's talk"
[00:53.88]
[00:56.20]And I said
[00:57.80]Stay stay stay
[00:59.31]
[01:00.13]I've been loving you for quite some time time time
[01:04.32]
[01:04.85]You think that it's funny when I'm mad mad mad
[01:09.48]But I think that it's best if we both stay
[01:13.55]
[01:17.05]Before you I'd only dated self-indulgent takers
[01:21.71]Who took all of their problems out on me
[01:24.69]
[01:26.29]But you carry my groceries and now I'm always laughing
[01:30.87]And I love you because you have given me
[01:34.60]No choice but to
[01:36.17]Stay stay stay
[01:37.73]
[01:38.46]I've been loving you for quite some time time time
[01:42.68]
[01:43.24]You think that it's funny when I'm mad mad mad
[01:47.91]But I think that it's best if we both stay stay stay stay
[01:55.51]
[02:05.00]You took the time to memorize me
[02:07.07]My fears my hopes and dreams
[02:08.71]I just like hanging out with you all the time
[02:14.28]All those times that you didn't leave it's been occurring to me
[02:18.47]I'd like to hang out with you for my whole life
[02:23.97]Stay and I'll be loving you for quite some time
[02:30.27]
[02:31.31]No one else is gonna love me when I get mad mad mad
[02:35.91]So I think that it's best if we both stay stay
[02:41.34]Stay stay stay stay
[02:43.21]Stay stay stay
[02:45.04]
[02:45.61]I've been loving you for quite some time time time
[02:49.82]
[02:50.38]You think that it's funny when I'm mad mad mad
[02:55.06]But I think that it's best if we both stay stay
[03:00.59]Stay stay stay stay
[03:02.51]Stay stay stay
[03:04.26]
[03:04.82]I've been loving you for quite some time time time
[03:09.07]
[03:09.58]You think that it's funny when I'm mad mad mad
[03:13.83]
[03:14.35]But I think that it's best if we both stay
[03:17.70]
[03:21.01]That's so fun
data.trans:
[ti:Stay Stay Stay (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.57]//
[00:13.15]//
[00:19.73]我很确定 昨晚的我们 几乎走到了尽头
[00:24.47]我把手机摔向房间另一头的你
[00:28.43]
[00:29.19]脑海里预告着你夺门而出的场景 
[00:33.41]可是 你却留了下来
[00:38.07]
[00:38.89]清晨来临的时候 我说 我们需要好好的谈一谈
[00:43.32]书本教会我 不应该将没有结论的争吵丢弃不管
[00:47.56]
[00:48.13]这时的你 带着橄榄球的头盔走了进来
[00:52.46]对我说 那就让我们好好谈一谈
[00:53.88]
[00:56.20]我说
[00:57.80]留下来 留在这里 不要离开
[00:59.31]
[01:00.13]我爱你 爱了好久 好久
[01:04.32]
[01:04.85]你觉得我生气的样子俏皮而可爱
[01:09.48]我想 我们都应该留下来
[01:13.55]
[01:17.05]在你之前 我遇见的都是自我放纵的索取者
[01:21.71]那时的我 忍受着一切
[01:24.69]
[01:26.29]但你却手提着我的杂货袋 此刻的我 总是挂着笑脸
[01:30.87]我爱你 
[01:34.60]别无选择 唯有
[01:36.17]留下来 留在这里 不要离开
[01:37.73]
[01:38.46]我爱你 爱了好久 好久
[01:42.68]
[01:43.24]你觉得我生气的样子俏皮而可爱
[01:47.91]我想 我们都应该留下来 
[01:55.51]
[02:05.00]你花了好多心思只为铭记我的所有
[02:07.07]我的脆弱 我的愿望 还有我的梦想
[02:08.71]我喜欢就这样 一直与你相依
[02:14.28]频繁的争吵 你不曾弃我而去 突然有了这样的感觉
[02:18.47]我想要就这样 一辈子和你相伴
[02:23.97]留下来 我会一直爱你 很久 很久
[02:30.27]
[02:31.31]当我生气之时 没有人会爱我
[02:35.91]所以 我想 我们都应该留下来
[02:41.34]留下来 留在这里 不要离开 
[02:43.21]留下来 留在这里 不要离开
[02:45.04]
[02:45.61]我爱你 爱了好久 好久
[02:49.82]
[02:50.38]你觉得我生气的样子俏皮而可爱
[02:55.06]我想 我们都应该留下来  
[03:00.59]留下来 留在这里 不要离开 
[03:02.51]留下来 留在这里 不要离开
[03:04.26]
[03:04.82]我爱你 爱了好久 好久
[03:09.07]
[03:09.58]你觉得我生气的样子俏皮而可爱
[03:13.83]
[03:14.35]我想 我们都应该留下来
[03:17.70]
[03:21.01]这是如此有趣
